text: Clyde Lorrain Cowan Jr (December 6, 1919 â€“ May 24, 1974) was an American physicist. He was the co-discoverer of the neutrino along with Frederick Reines. The discovery was made in 1956 in the neutrino experiment. Frederick Reines received the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1995 in both their names. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:1974 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American physicists Category:Scientists from Detroit
title: Clyde Cowan
